name: find_indels
description: Parse a bamfile and document indels.
usage: find_indels [-h] [-m MIN_INDEL_LENGTH] [-a] [-o OUTPUT] [-b BED] [-t THREADS] bam

options.description: show this help message and exit
Filter out indels shorter than this length. (default: 0)
Include secondary and supplementary alignments. (default: False)
Output indels to file instead of stdout. (default: <_io.TextIOWrapper name='<stdout>' mode='w' encoding='utf-8'>)
Number of threads for parallel processing. (default: 1)
